subject: Demonstrations, Protests, and Riots
College Athletics
Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Demonstrators took to the streets in State College, Pa., after Penn State’s football coach, Joe Paterno, was fired amid a sexual-abuse scandal.
snippet: Demonstrators took to the streets in State College, Pa., after Penn State’s football coach, Joe Paterno, was fired amid a sexual-abuse scandal.
